title: Message Board
imageDesc: Preview of the Message Board project
gihubRepoDesc: GitHub logo linking to Message Board repository
description: Create an account and post a message to a public forum. Become a member using 'pleaseLetMePost1Message'. Reach out for an Admin password.

title: Match the Color
imageDesc: Preview of the Match the Color project
gihubRepoDesc: GitHub logo linking to Photo Tagging App repository
description: Find the three randomly selected colors among the pixels from their hexadecimal value alone (and some directional clues after guesses).

title: Etch-A-Sketch
gihubRepoDesc: GitHub logo linking to Message Board repository
description: Use your mouse to mimic a classic toy inside a browser window. Has the ability to change canvas size as well as drawing color. Showcases DOM manipulation with user selections.

title: Knight Travails
imageDesc: Preview of the Knight Travails project
gihubRepoDesc: GitHub logo linking to Knight Travails repository
description: Finds the shortest route for a knight to reach a particular spot on a chessboard using a graph data structure. Board origin is [0,0] in the top left and with [7,7] in the bottom right. User input currently in development.

title: Shop
gihubRepoDesc: GitHub logo linking to Shop repository
description: Pretend to go shopping for made up items. A React app showcasing variable passing between components.
